name: MSF_domain2bsml
description: convert MSF format alignment files into BSML documents

options.description: [REQUIRED] Dir containing MSF format alignment files that ends in *.msf • --output,-o [REQUIRED] output BSML file • --suffix,-s suffix of the multiple sequence alignment file. Default(msf) • --program,-p projects this analyisi is for. Default(clustal) • --help,-h This help message
